column5: Is it clean and have you had any problems with anything getting stolen? Scott
Could anyone supply me the names and #'s of any of the motels in Ear Falls and/or Vermillion Bay? Thanks!
We have stayed at the Northside in Vermillion Bay for several years 807-227-5339
>Could anyone supply me the names and #'s of any of the motels >in Ear Falls and/or Vermillion Bay? > trillium 807 222 3126 hotel 105 807 222 3374 you will be happy with either
We stay at Travelers Motel in Vermilion Bay 807-227-2091
We stay at Travelers Motel in Vermilion Bay 807-227-2091
The problem with hotels in Ear Falls (and Pat can attest to this) is that it is hard to get a room. They are/were working on the hydro plant and they are full of construction workers.
Best place to stay in Ear Falls is HWY 105 Motel It is far cleaner and much better run I have stayed there the last two years The owner Doug is a really great host
Merc How is the Travelers to stay at? Do they have a restaurant and how far is it from Red Lake Road? Scott
Yes they have a resturant and there is another one across the street. The Red lake road( Hy 105) is also across the street from Travelers. It is about 55-60 miles to Ear Falls.
